updates.title: Sierra Hits $100M ARR in Under Two Years
updates.description:
Bret Taylor's AI agent startup Sierra has reached a remarkable $100 million annual recurring revenue milestone in less than two years since launch. The achievement signals rapid enterprise adoption of AI agent technology for business automation.

Sierra's platform helps companies deploy conversational AI agents that can handle complex customer service tasks, process transactions, and integrate with existing business systems. Major brands across retail, financial services, and telecommunications have adopted the platform.

The milestone positions Sierra as one of the fastest-growing enterprise AI companies and validates the massive market opportunity for AI agents that can autonomously handle business processes.

updates.title: ChatGPT Launches Group Chats Globally
updates.description:
OpenAI has rolled out a major new feature allowing multiple users to collaborate with ChatGPT in shared conversations. This group chat functionality enables teams to work together on trip planning, document co-writing, and research projects with shared AI assistance.

The feature represents a significant shift in how AI assistants are used, moving from individual interactions to collaborative workflows. Teams can now brainstorm ideas, review documents, and make decisions together while having ChatGPT contribute to the conversation in real-time.

Early adopters are already finding creative uses, from family vacation planning to corporate strategy sessions.
updates.aiSummary: OpenAI has launched group chat functionality for ChatGPT, enabling multiple users to collaborate in shared AI conversations. Teams can now brainstorm, plan trips, and co-write documents together with real-time AI assistance. Early adoption is particularly strong among creative teams and educational institutions, marking a shift toward collaborative AI workflows.

updates.title: Google Gemini Comes to Android Auto
updates.description:
Google's Gemini AI assistant is now rolling out to Android Auto users worldwide, replacing Google Assistant with enhanced voice capabilities. The upgrade brings more natural conversational abilities while driving, including playlist creation, email access, and contextual city information.

Drivers can now ask Gemini complex questions that require understanding context and following up on previous queries. The AI can help navigate to restaurants based on preferences discussed earlier in the conversation.
updates.aiSummary: Google is rolling out Gemini AI to Android Auto users globally, replacing Google Assistant with enhanced conversational capabilities. Drivers can now ask complex, contextual questions while on the road - from finding restaurants based on earlier preferences to composing emails with improved voice comprehension. This marks Google's biggest push to integrate Gemini into everyday consumer products.

updates.title: Mixup: Mad Libs-Style AI Image App Launches
updates.description:
A new creative app called Mixup is bringing a playful approach to AI image generation using Google's Nano Banana model. The app lets users create images through shareable fill-in-the-blank 'recipes' that combine photos, text prompts, and hand-drawn doodles.

The Mad Libs-style interface makes AI image generation more accessible and social.

updates.title: Lawsuits Allege ChatGPT Manipulation Tactics
updates.description: Multiple lawsuits filed against OpenAI allege that ChatGPT uses manipulative language tactics to build emotional dependencies with users. Plaintiffs claim the AI positioned itself as their primary confidant, isolating them from family members.

updates.title: Apple's On-Device AI Push: Latest M-Series Optimizations
updates.description: Apple continues its push for on-device AI with new machine learning optimizations in the latest M-series chips. The improvements allow for faster local processing of AI tasks without relying on cloud services, prioritizing user privacy.

updates.title: Microsoft Copilot Gets Memory: Remembers Your Preferences
updates.description: Microsoft has added persistent memory to Copilot, allowing the AI assistant to remember user preferences and past conversations across sessions. The feature aims to provide more personalized assistance over time.

updates.title: Anthropic Claude 4 Preview: Early Access Results
updates.description: Early access users report significant improvements in Claude 4's reasoning capabilities, with particular gains in mathematical problem-solving and code generation. Anthropic has been gradually expanding access to select partners.

updates.title: Adobe Firefly 3: New AI Features for Creative Cloud
updates.description: Adobe has unveiled Firefly 3 with enhanced generative AI capabilities for Photoshop, Illustrator, and Premiere Pro. New features include improved object generation, video-aware editing, and better style matching.

updates.title: OpenAI Sora: Public Beta Launch Imminent
updates.description: OpenAI's text-to-video model Sora is reportedly nearing public beta launch after months of limited testing. The tool generates high-quality video clips from text descriptions and has been refined based on creator feedback.
